hero.name: Aman Kumar
hero.tagline: Motivated AI and Python developer with hands-on experience in machine learning, computer vision, and Unity-based interactive systems. Seeking an entry-level AI/ML or Python developer role where I can apply data-driven problem solving and real-world project experience to build scalable intelligent solutions.

experience.description: Worked on applied AI research and prototyping intelligent systems.
Built immersive 3D and AI-powered interactive experiences.
Focused on AI, data science, and core computer science foundations.

about.text: I care about how things feel as much as how they work. I like interfaces that respond quickly, explain themselves, and don’t show off. Most of my work sits at the intersection of AI research and immersive spatial experiences.
about.status: Currently open to work · Based in NCR, India
